File history

Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current04:28, 15 January 2022900 × 600 (621 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Changing colors (again). The I colours I used in previous upload did not seem to match reality.
16:57, 30 December 2021900 × 600 (621 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Centering stars in the black stripe instead of centering the imaginary circles around the stars. This version has an appearance that is almost the same as the original uploaded in by User:SKopp in 2005.
05:47, 22 October 2021900 × 600 (625 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Adding clipping path to the stripe. This stops the stripe from protruding past the corners when this file is imported into another SVG file.
02:31, 19 October 2021900 × 600 (512 bytes)MapGrid (talk | contribs)Updated to match construction sheet: File:Flag of Saint Kitts and Nevis (construction sheet).svg
20:31, 19 May 2014750 × 500 (883 bytes)SiBr4 (talk | contribs)Code cleanup
08:36, 7 January 2007900 × 600 (1 KB)Pumbaa80 (talk | contribs)Code simplified
04:03, 14 February 2006450 × 300 (5 KB)Denelson83 (talk | contribs)Reconstructed according to http://www.fotw.net/flags/kn.html
07:10, 28 September 2005450 × 300 (3 KB)SKopp (talk | contribs)The flag of Saint Kitts and Nevis. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Saint Kitts and Nevis

The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
